name: 100 Rep Daily KB Challenge (@gymfiesta)
description: 100 reps of 6 kettlebell exercises — around-the-body passes, side swings, upright rows, swings, tricep extensions, and bent-over horn rows. Do it daily with a light bell. High volume, full body, posture and conditioning focused.

exercises.notes: Pass KB around your hips/body. Alternate directions. 4x25 = 100 total.
Side-to-side swings across the body. 4x25 = 100 total. Use core rotation.
Strict pull — elbows high, shrug at top, no hip snap. 4x25 = 100 total.
Standard two-handed swings. Squeeze glutes hard at top. 4x25 = 100 total.
Hold by horns overhead, lower behind head, extend. Elbows stay close. 4x25 = 100 total.
Both hands on horns, bent over, row to hips and extend. 4x25 = 100 total.

tips: Use a LIGHT kettlebell — this is 600 total reps
Break each 100 into 4x25 or 5x20 as needed
Designed to be done daily — not a max effort session
Focus on form over speed at this volume
